text:
How to determine the domain and range of a function from a table

\begin{array}{|c|c|}\n\hline x & y \\\n\hline 3 & 2 \\\n\hline 5 & 6 \\\n\hline 7 & 10 \\\n\hline-4 & 3 \\\n\hline\n\end{array}[imath]\hline x & y [/imath] [imath]\hline 3 & 2 [/imath] [imath]\hline 5 & 6 [/imath] [imath]\hline 7 & 10 [/imath] [imath]\hline-4 & 3 [/imath] [imath]\hline[/imath]
